___xrpBalance.description: The XRP balance owned by the account.

___previousAffectingTransactionLedgerVer.description: The ledger version that the transaction identified by the `previousAffectingTransactionID` was validated in.

___previousInitiatedTransactionID.description: Hash value representing the most recent transaction that was initiated by this account.

___sequence.description: The next (smallest unused) sequence number for this account.

___previousAffectingTransactionID.description: Hash value representing the most recent transaction that affected this account node directly. **Note:** This does not include changes to the account’s trust lines and offers.

___ownerCount.description: Number of other ledger entries (specifically, trust lines and offers) attributed to this account. This is used to calculate the total reserve required to use the account.
